title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater beautiful, well-made, and super soft, with one noting it looks and feels expensive. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute for fall time!
items.body: So cute and good material! Very thick and high quality! I got a size small and was a little on the longer size but I am also 5’2 for reference. Super soft and can wear and style for multiple occasions Read more
items.author: Aaliyah Ortiz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful holiday sweater
items.body: This sweater looks and feels so good. It is soft and it hugs your curves the way it should. The knit is substantial enough to hold the collar up without having to fight with it. Very happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little thicker than expected but very nice quality!
items.body: A bit thicker than I expected but still soft and flattering. I’m keeping it. Fits nicely. Love the brown color. Read more
items.author: Toni S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: I’m 6’2 and it fits beautifully. Great quality. It’s truly gorgeous. Don’t hesitate. Just buy it Read more
items.author: Nani

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: I bought a Medium and it’s really tight and I usually wear a medium. It doesn’t stay “off the shoulder”. It is cute and very warm material. Read more
items.author: elizabeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase!
items.body: Even though this is definitely a drop ship product, it is really nice quality. The sweater is decently thick, the material is soft, and it’s very flattering. I usually wear a small in tops, but after reading reviews and looking at the size chart, I went with a large - and it fit perfectly. It definitely runs small, but if you go by the size chart, you can make an accurate judgement on the size you’ll need. The folded part does come up slightly if you raise your arms above your head, but I feel like that’s to be expected no matter what top you get, but I’d say this one stays put better than most. I plan on putting a few stitches around the neck to keep it extra in place. Color was very accurate to the pictures and so was fit. Would purchase again! Read more
items.author: Liz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful quality, buttery soft material
items.body: I’m actually surprised at the quality of this sweater for the price. It looks and feels expensive, as if it’s from a luxury brand. It’s super soft and comfortable. The sleeves are very form fitting, so I ordered a size up and was really happy. It’s the perfect shade of Santa red for Christmas. It came folded and vacuum sealed so I’ll need to un-wrinkle it but I’m really happy with this sweater! Read more
items.author: Rob

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Shoulder to tight
items.body: Could not get it to fit off my shoulders like pictured Read more
items.author: Amanda

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Mid Grey, Grey Blue, Army Green, Mineral Blue, Sage Green, Black, Coffee, Light Blue, Wine Red, Bean Paste Pink, Khaki, White, Heather Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
